item.title: The Lamb
item.description: We were at Ely Cathedral last night for Baby G’s school held a “Nine lessons” service, where she was singing in the main choir. Generally an excellent evening. A particular standout for me was the school’s chamber choir, and their performance of ‘The Lamb’ by John Tavener. This was somewhat of a Proustian moment for me.
